title: Brady touts Coleman: 'Stood on the table' for WR
content: New Bills coach Joe Brady expressed his support for wide receiver Keon Coleman, stating that "Keon Coleman is going to be a Buffalo Bill."

title: Poch: WC ticket prices nothing to do with USMNT
content: United States coach Mauricio Pochettino said it was not his job -- nor that of his players -- to evaluate or weigh in on the price of tickets for this summer's World Cup.

title: Bills' Allen has surgery, expects quick recovery
content: Bills quarterback Josh Allen says he expects to be ready for OTAs after having foot surgery this week.

title: Record $1.76B expected to be bet on Super Bowl
content: Approximately $1.76 billion is expected to be bet on Super Bowl LX with U.S. sportsbooks, a nearly 27% year-over-year increase, according to the AGA.

content: Lakers center Jaxson Hayes and Spurs rookie Carter Bryant have accepted invitations to the NBA slam dunk contest at All-Star Weekend in Los Angeles, sources said.

title: Pregnant SWAT commando murdered by husband; dowry charge added
content: A 24-year-old Delhi Police SWAT commando, Kajal Chaudhary, died after allegedly being attacked by her husband, Ankur Chaudhary. The victim was four months pregnant. Police have added murder and dowry charges after her family alleged harassment over dowry. The accused, a clerk in the Union defence ministry, has been suspended.

title: ‚ÄòHe meant it‚Äô: US warns Iran on nukes, signals Trump has military options ready
content: Secretary of War Pete Hegseth issued a stern warning to Iran against developing nuclear weapons, stating the US is prepared to act under President Trump's directives. He highlighted the ongoing military deployment in the Middle East as a demonstration of readiness and deterrence, emphasizing the administration's commitment to preventing a nuclear Iran.

title: From Boeing 737 examiner to ‚ÄòBunny‚Äô: The life of Baramati crash victim Capt. Sumit Kapur
content: Pilot Sumit Kapur, known as "Bunny," died in a charter aircraft crash in Maharashtra. A respected examiner with 20,000 flight hours, Kapur was remembered for his warmth and precision by family and colleagues.

title: Vinod Khosla gives 230-word-long reply to Elon Musk
content: Billionaire Vinod Khosla fired back at Elon Musk on X, dismissing Musk's defense against racism accusations by citing his partner's Indian heritage. Khosla accused Musk of promoting a racially exclusionary agenda and urged him to focus on the substance of his public commentary rather than invoking family ties.

title: Virat Kohli Insta disappears; fans flood Anushka Sharma‚Äôs posts
content: Cricket fans are buzzing on Anushka Sharma's social media, curious about the sudden absence of Virat Kohli's Instagram account. Theories of a possible break or temporary suspension are swirling, prompting many to express their worries and implore the actress to encourage her husband to rejoin the digital landscape. So far, neither Kohli nor Sharma has commented on this intriguing situation.

title: Peter Thiel to Europe: You can never have a Google, Microsoft, or Amazon, because you fear‚Ä¶
content: Billionaire Peter Thiel argues European tech founders are too risk-averse, cashing out early instead of pursuing global scale. He contrasts this with Silicon Valley's embrace of failure, citing Mark Zuckerberg's rejection of a $1 billion Facebook offer.  Venture capital data shows the US significantly outpaces Europe in funding and large investment funds, highlighting a persistent gap.

title: T20 WC row: 'Nahi khelenge'- Former Pakistan captain floats India match boycott plan
content: Former Pakistan captain Rashid Latif has withdrawn his call for a full T20 World Cup boycott, stating the opportune moment has passed. He now suggests Pakistan could refuse to play India, a decision he insists must come from the government. Latif believes a boycott now would lack impact after Bangladesh's exclusion.

title: Suicide pact? Greater Noida couple dead; their 3 kids found poisoned, saved in time
content: A couple died and their three children were found poisoned in Greater Noida's Ecotech 3 area. The children, aged 10, 8, and 4, are now out of danger after hospitalisation. Preliminary investigations suggest the couple may have consumed poison due to domestic issues.

title: Bangladesh crash out of U19 World Cup; BCB flags 'unfair schedule' by ICC
content: Bangladesh's Under-19 World Cup campaign concluded amidst criticism from their cricket board regarding unfair match scheduling and travel arrangements. The BCB highlighted the team's extensive travel, including a nine-hour bus journey, and accused the ICC of ignoring their concerns about the demanding itinerary.

title: How Canadian PM Mark Carney's China visit 'resets' what Justin Trudeau tried in 2017
content: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney's visit to China signals a significant shift in policy, with the PM stating China is a more predictable trading partner than the US. This realignment comes as Canada seeks to strengthen ties with Beijing, focusing on trade, energy, and agriculture, despite past diplomatic tensions stemming from the Huawei CEO's arrest.

title: ‚ÄòMust be corrected‚Äô: Trump threatens Canada with 50% aircraft tariff; dispute over jet certification
content: President Trump has threatened Canada with a 50% tariff on all aircraft sold in the U.S. This retaliatory measure follows Canada's refusal to certify jets from Gulfstream Aerospace. The U.S. also plans to decertify all Canadian aircraft, impacting manufacturers like Bombardier.

title: Thierry Henry and Andrea Rajacic net worth, wealth and love story
content: Thierry Henry became a football legend with clubs like Arsenal and Barcelona, then stayed in the game as a coach and TV expert. By early 2026, his net worth is estimated around $125‚Äì135 million. His long-time partner Andrea Rajacic, who works in fashion, has her own income. Together, they share a quiet family life and a combin

title: MLB trade rumors: Braves eye $35M Cubs star as Robert Suarez emerges key asset
content: A hypothetical trade sees the Atlanta Braves acquiring versatile infielder Nico Hoerner from the Chicago Cubs for hard-throwing reliever Robert Suarez. This move addresses Atlanta's infield void due to injury, while Chicago secures a much-needed closer. Both players are in their prime with multi-year control, making it a balanced, win-now exchange.

title: 'I needed to let him go': Gabrielle Union on almost ending marriage with Dwyane Wade
content: Dwyane Wade and his wife, the popular actress Gabrielle Union, have had a beautiful and a healthy marriage ever since they tied the knot in 2014.While things have always been good between them, Gabrielle Union went through a traumatic struggles as she tried to conceive their baby early on in their marriage. Unfortunately, the popular actress went through a number of miscarriages and had to opt for surrogacy later. While the miscarriages affected her health, Gabrielle Union opened up how it changed her relationship with Dwyane Wade.

title: 'Border 2' box office collection day 7
content: The war drama 'Border 2' has achieved a significant milestone, crossing Rs 300 crore worldwide within its first week of release. Despite a strong opening and impressive weekend collections, the film experienced a drop in weekday earnings but continues to maintain its pace at the box office.

title: Trump signs executive order to impose tariffs on countries supplying oil to Cuba
content: President Trump signed an executive order allowing new tariffs on countries selling oil to Cuba, intensifying US pressure on the Cuban government. Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum stated her country has temporarily halted oil shipments to Cuba, asserting it was a sovereign decision independent of US influence.

title: Democrats, White House strike spending deal; temporarily avert US government shutdown
content: Democrats and the White House are nearing a spending deal to avert a government shutdown, with negotiations focusing on immigration enforcement limits. A temporary two-week funding extension for Homeland Security is tentatively agreed upon, separating it from the larger spending bill to allow further talks on ICE operations and agent conduct.

title: Quote of the day by stoic philosopher Seneca: 'But when you are looking on anyone...'
content: Seneca, a Roman philosopher, offered Stoic principles for navigating life's challenges. His teachings, emphasizing virtue and controlling one's reactions, remain relevant today.  Seneca's emphasis on time management, emotional regulation, and genuine trust in friendships provides practical guidance for modern life.

title: ‚ÄòPaying too much interest‚Äô: Trump to announce Fed chair nominee next week, replacing Jerome Powell
content: President Trump announced he will name his nominee for the next Federal Reserve chair next week, replacing Jerome Powell. Trump has repeatedly criticized current interest rates as "unacceptably high" and hurting the economy. He is considering four individuals for the crucial role.

title: Myles Garrett‚Äôs Instagram story shows frustration after Jim Schwartz snub
content: The Cleveland Browns‚Äô offseason begins on a difficult note after hiring Todd Monken as head coach over Jim Schwartz. Schwartz has decided not to return as defensive coordinator, and star defensive end Myles Garrett shared a silent Instagram post showing frustration. With Garrett under contract through 2030, these coaching changes could affect team chemistry and performance in 2026.

title: Baramati plane crash: Neither company nor govt has contacted us, says flight attendant‚Äôs family
content: Flight attendant Pinky Mali, who died in a plane crash with Deputy CM Ajit Pawar, was cremated in Dadar. Her father and husband expressed deep hurt over the lack of communication from the airline and government, demanding a thorough investigation. Neighbours remembered Pinky and her husband as a warm couple.

title: Maharashtra deputy CM Ajit Pawar‚Äôs death: Clip of plane suggests loss of control at low altitude
content: Low visibility initiated a series of events leading to the Learjet crash that killed Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and four others. CCTV footage revealed the aircraft abruptly rolled left and descended near-vertically, suggesting a loss of control at low altitude. Pilots had no time for recovery, with potential causes including engine failure or control surface issues.

title: After Trump push, Venezuela moves to open oil sector, ending years of state control
content: Venezuela's National Assembly has approved a new law opening its oil sector to private companies. This reverses a policy of state control lasting over 20 years. The law allows private firms to manage oil production and sales. It also permits international arbitration for disputes. Extraction taxes will be adjusted.

title: Trump says US will reopen commercial airspace over Venezuela
content: US President Donald Trump announced the reopening of commercial airspace over Venezuela, allowing Americans to travel to the country soon. This move follows initial steps to restore diplomatic ties, including deploying temporary staff to the US Embassy. American Airlines plans to resume flights, reconnecting families and fostering business between the nations after a diplomatic breakdown in 2019.

title: Karnataka man dies of Kyasanur Forest Disease; Doctor details symptoms and high-risk season
content: A 29-year-old man in Karnataka has succumbed to Kyasanur Forest Disease (KFD), commonly known as monkey fever, highlighting the dangers of this tick-borne illness. While KFD doesn't spread human-to-human, it's transmitted by forest ticks and can cause severe symptoms including bleeding and neurological issues. Early detection is crucial for survival.

title: Tom Brady sparks rumors as Kendall Jenner FaceTime goes viral
content: Kendall Jenner surprised viewers on The Tonight Show by calling Tom Brady live to help pick a Super Bowl winner. Despite admitting limited football knowledge, she ultimately chose the Patriots based on a gut feeling. This prediction is part of a Fanatics partnership that will donate $1 million to charity, regardless of the game's outcome.

title: Zodiac signs who love attention by their partners
content: Attention is a vital currency in relationships, with 62% viewing it as a key indicator of mutual interest.  For some, it's reassurance; for others, a sign of love.  When attention fades, individuals feel less connected, impacting their sense of value and security within the partnership.

title: RCB crush UP Warriorz by eight wickets to storm into WPL final
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru secured a dominant eight-wicket victory over UP Warriorz, propelling them into the WPL final. Grace Harris's explosive 75 off 37 balls, supported by Smriti Mandhana's fifty, chased down UPW's 143 with ease. Nadine de Klerk's four-wicket haul was crucial in restricting the opposition earlier.

title: 'Wuthering Heights' Twitter reviews HAIL Margot-Jacob's chemistry
content: The atmosphere at the 'Wuthering Heights' premiere is electric, thanks to Margot Robbie and Jacob Elordi's sizzling chemistry. Early feedback highlights Emerald Fennell's fearless interpretation as a 'red-hot' and 'intricately twisted' masterpiece, set to deliver a fervent and heartbreakingly immersive viewing journey.

title: Dhurandhar OTT release announced makers skip promotions for debut
content: Get ready to binge-watch Ranveer Singh‚Äôs 'Dhurandhar' on Netflix! After a staggering Rs 1300 crore at the box office, this gripping espionage thriller is making waves online in Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu. Director Aditya Dhar is thrilled about this new journey for the film, encouraging everyone to join the adventure and uncover the secrets packed into this epic saga.

title: Brooks Koepka‚Äôs PGA Tour return emotional after wife Jena Sims‚Äô message
content: Brooks Koepka has returned to the PGA Tour at the Farmers Insurance Open after leaving LIV Golf. Despite facing penalties, his focus remains steady. His wife, Jena Sims Koepka, marked the moment with a simple message while highlighting family first. Fatherhood has changed Koepka, but his drive to win majors remains strong.

title: Giannis Antetokounmpo ruled out for Bucks vs. Wizards tonight
content: Milwaukee's superstar Giannis Antetokounmpo is sidelined with a right calf strain, ruling him out of tonight's game against the Washington Wizards. This isn't a game-time decision; he's officially out for several weeks, impacting the Bucks' offensive firepower and defensive presence.  His absence significantly alters betting lines and fantasy projections for the team.

title: WWE Royal Rumble 2026 predictions: Will Cena, Rock or Jericho appear?
content: The 2026 Royal Rumble in Riyadh is igniting fan excitement, with speculation rife about legendary returns. While John Cena has officially retired, a surprise cameo remains a possibility. Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson's Hollywood commitments make his appearance uncertain, but a milestone moment is not ruled out.

title: Bo Bichette loss to Mets angers Phillies fans as Dombrowski takes heat
content: Bo Bichette signed with the New York Mets on January 20, 2026, leaving the Philadelphia Phillies empty-handed. Phillies president Dave Dombrowski publicly said losing Bichette was a ‚Äúgut punch.‚Äù Philadelphia re-signed catcher J.T. Realmuto but did not land that big free agent bat. Fans and analysts are now debating whether the Phillies‚Äô winter was a success or not.

title: Tariff war, AI bubble: Crisis worse than 2008 looming? Economic Survey explains what India should do
content: Fundamentally, factors that shape the trade policy are changing. It is now majorly about security and political considerations rather than efficiency or multilateral rules.

title: Texas MAGA turns heat on H-1B visa scheme; 'firms run by Indians' under lens
content: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton has launched a probe into alleged H-1B visa fraud by North Texas companies, suspecting "sham operations" and "ghost offices" that disadvantage American workers. This move, alongside a gubernatorial directive freezing new visa petitions, highlights a political battle within the Texas GOP, with implications for immigration and labor policy.

title: The Khamenei question: Can Trump's 'beautiful armada' take out Iran's Supreme Leader?
content: US President Trump is escalating pressure on Iran with a significant naval deployment and threats of severe retaliation for any attacks.  He's considering targeted strikes, even on top leadership, aiming for a regime change similar to Venezuela.  Iran warns of a powerful response, while regional allies express deep concern over potential escalation and instability.

title: Governor inaugurates 108-foot national flag at Mehdipatnam Garrison
content: The programme included a guard of honour, hoisting of the Tricolour and the rendition of the national anthem

title: Solving Bengaluru‚Äôs parking puzzle
content: While paid parking is being introduced on more stretches and towing is set to make a comeback, Chetan B.C. explores if these measures are enough to solve Bengaluru‚Äôs traffic maze

title: PRIYA trial links teen B12 intake to long-term health in babies
content: Vitamin B12 could be a ‚Äòregulator of regulators‚Äô that controls enzymes involved in gene expression; based on the finding, experts said the national policy should include vitamin B12 supplements to improve the nutritional status of adolescents and women of reproductive age

title: Colleges within schools
content: From just a couple of government colleges in 1966, the year Haryana was formed, the State now has 186. The policy of every school graduate having access to a college within 20 km propelled Haryana into number-driven growth over the past five years. On ground though, Ashok Kumar finds that many colleges are run from school buildings, there are few courses on offer, and an acute shortage of teaching staff leaves students at a disadvantage

title: Guwahati Refinery solely supplied smokeless fuel to Indian Army during Ops Sindoor: Official

content: In an X post, the IAF stated that a dedicated team of Air Warriors was deployed at the urgent request of civic authorities following a plane crash at Baramati Airport

title: Suvendu Adhikari visits fire affected warehouse, says many are still missing
content: The Leader of Opposition said that when he reached the area, he found that Section 163(2) BNSS was issued, banning the Assembly of five or more persons within a 100-metre radius of the incident site

title: Bihar Cabinet approves additional financial assistance to beneficiaries of Mukhyamantri Mahila Rozgar Yojana
content: In order to streamline and regulate the government employees with regard to the use of social media, the State Cabinet approved the Government Servants‚Äô Conduct (Amendment) Rules, 2026 which will be implemented across the entire state

title: Manipur aims to resettle 40,000 IDPs by March
content: The State government has released ‚Çπ124 crore toward rehabilitating 3,700 families to date, an official statement said

title: In Bihar, farmers‚Äô registration work will be carried out from February 2 to 6
content: Goal to Quickly Enter the Second Phase of ‚ÄòAgriStack‚Äô in the Interest of Farmers. Farmers will receive free services at Common Service Centers (CSC); no fees will be charged

title: SIR in Gujarat: 6.88 lakh seek inclusion, 9.88 lakh deletion in electoral rolls
content: Officials said the final decision on additions and deletions will be taken after verification of the applications and supporting documents

title: HC questions govt. for not setting up heritage commission
content: High Court orders the publication of a notification in leading dailies, calling for applications for the post of chairman of the commission

title: Kerala Budget 2026-27: A statement of fiscal resilience in a volatile federal framework
content: The Budget presented by State Finance Minister K.N. Balagopal serves as a blueprint for navigating global disorder and domestic fiscal challenges. It prioritises revenue-led fiscal consolidation, prudent debt management, inclusive welfare, and innovative investments

title: Heavy security arrangements in Thiruvananthapuram ahead of India-New Zealand T20I match
content: As per the security protocol, the stadium and its surrounding areas have been declared a temporary ‚ÄòRed Zone‚Äô on January 30 and 31

title: Medical college doctors condemn ‚Äòneglect‚Äô in Kerala Budget
content: KGMCTA says while a host of populist measures were announced for all categories of government servants, the doctors were denied even their pay arrears

title: Kerala Budget 2026-27: New scheme to provide safe lodging for women employees of IT parks
content: Budget earmarks ‚Çπ950.89 crore for labour and labour welfare sector, an increase of ‚Çπ436.45 crore as compared to last year

title: Prakash Raj pushes for Palestinian films at BIFFes, Siddaramaiah stops short of commitment
content: Speaking in broad strokes, the Chief Minister reiterated that BIFFes aims to provide a platform to understand politics, life, equality and the suffering across countries

title: Religious fervour peaks as Sammakka ceremonially placed on Gadde at shrine, devotee influx set to surge
content: Earlier, following Mulugu Superintendent of Police firing a few rounds into the air, Koya priests, led by Chief Priest Kokkera Krishnaiah, brought down the presiding diety from Chilakalagutta after performing traditional secret rituals in accordance with Koya tribal customs

title: Economic Survey calls for fiscal flexibility for the Centre, cautions States against worsening finances
content: The Economic Survey argued that, while the Centre has managed to substantially improve its fiscal deficit ratios since the COVID-19 pandemic, the States have seen their finances worsen over this period due to falling revenue and higher spending on unconditional cash transfers

title: Minor Kashmiri hawker assaulted in Dehradun
content: The victim sustained multiple injuries, including a fractured arm, in the assault; While his cousin escaped with minor injuries

content: Mr.¬†Panneerselvam¬†was removed for betraying the party, the AIADMK general secretary says; in his sharpest attack on TVK leader Vijay, Mr. Palaniswami asks, ‚ÄúAfter the¬†Karur¬†stampede, Mr.¬†Vijay¬†could not even visit the families of the deceased. Then, what is the meaning of running a political party?‚Äù

content: ‚ÄúMajority of illegal sheds were put up during 2024-25 and no structure existed on this land prior to 2014‚Äù

title: Cutting carbon emissions should not be top priority: Economic Survey
content: The Survey in its past iterations has framed climate change as a global risk that threatens food production, livelihoods and has called upon countries - at various times - to ‚Äúsupport‚Äù developing countries such as India to transition away from fossil fuel

title: Kerala Budget 2026-27: ‚Çπ27.82 cr. allocation for environment and habitat sector
content: It includes the allocation of ‚Çπ10.82 crore for the Department of Environment and Climate Change, ‚Çπ13 crore for the Kerala State Biodiversity Board, ‚Çπ3 crore for the Kerala State Pollution Control Board, and ‚Çπ1 crore for the Kerala State Climate Change Adaptation Mission

title: Farmer kills leopard in fight for survival, booked under Wildlife Act
content: The 60-year-old farmer fought off the big cat with a sickle and a spear after it pounced on him and his son in a village in Gujarat; forest officials register case under the Wildlife (Protection) Act, 1972

title: Economic Survey points to decrease in agricultural growth in 2025-26
content: Average annual growth rate over last five years was 4.4% but the second quarter of current financial year saw 3.5% growth, which is less than the average

title: Economic Survey highlights Tamil Nadu‚Äôs ‚ÄòThozhi‚Äô hostels for working women and measures aimed at coastal restoration
content: These hostels offer a blueprint for States seeking to expand women workforce,¬†the Economic Survey says, even while lauding¬†TN-SHORE¬†that is meant to enhance coastal biodiversity and protection

title: Madras High Court dismisses case against ECR widening project
content: Justice P.T. Asha rejects the writ petition filed by Bhopal-based Dilip Buildcon against Hyderabad-based KNR Constructions

title: A.P. CM tells officials to expedite NH projects worth ‚Çπ1.40 lakh crore
content: Officials instructed to ready plans to convert the two-lane highways into four or six-lane ones and complete the projects worth ‚Çπ42,194 crore by the end of 2027¬†

title: Religious fervour peaks as Sammakka is brought down from Chilakalagutta hillock at Medaram
content: Devotees jostled for a glimpse of the procession as it moved towards the Medaram tribal shrine after Mulugu Superintendent of Police Sudhir R. Kekan fired a few rounds into the air from an AK-47 assault rifle as a mark of respect to the tribal deity as part of a long-standing tradition followed since 1996

title: Kerala Budget 2026-27: industry forums welcome Budget despite concerns over fund mobilisation
content: Social development thrust and big-ticket infrastructure promises drew praise from trade bodies and professional groups, even as questions were raised about implementation capacity, allocations for startups, and the impact on ease of doing business

title: Health Dept. releases ‚Çπ128.43 cr. NHM funds to all districts in A.P.
content: The funds were part of the final instalment under the NHM budget to the State for the 2025‚Äì26 fiscal year, says official

title: PMAY households in A.P. to get energy-efficient appliances
content: A.P. State Housing Corporation Limited, A.P. State Energy Efficiency Development Corporation and Energy Efficiency Services Limited sign MoU for integrating energy-efficient appliances with the PMAY in Andhra Pradesh¬†

title: Cancer becoming a ‚Äòpublic health concern‚Äô in Kerala, says Economic Review 2025
content: ‚ÄòDelays in early detection, huge treatment costs, minimal treatment centres and lack of awareness contribute to high mortality; lung cancers in males and females showed an increasing trend between 2010 and 2020‚Äô

title: Unconditional cash transfers putting State finances at risk, Economic Survey 2025-26 warns
content: The Survey noted that aggregate spending on UCT programmes, particularly for women, is estimated at about ‚Çπ1.7 lakh crore for the current financial year 2025-26

title: Travel operators seek relocation of toll plazas at Bengaluru entry points
content: In a letter addressed to Deputy Chief Minister D. K. Shivakumar recently, the association said that the residents of both Bengaluru Urban and Rural districts are being forced to pay toll charges even for short-distance daily travel into the city for work, education, healthcare and business.

title: QR code wristbands help reunite two missing children at Medaram Maha Jatara
content: When a lost child is found, the QR code on the wristband can be scanned using a smartphone, which immediately displays the registered contact number, enabling the police or members of the public to inform the parents and ensure the child is safely reunited, IGP, Multizone-2, explained

title: Kerala Budget 2026-27: ‚Çπ20 cr. allocated to medical college headlines Palakkad‚Äôs gains
content: Pattambi Assembly constituency has also received major allocations, including ‚Çπ75 crore for a flyover bypass

title: Economic Survey suggests marketing ban and highest¬†GST on ultra-processed foods to tackle obesity
content: Restrictions may also be levied on¬†marketing of infant and toddler milk and beverages to tackle rising obesity

title: US Issues License For Oil Companies To Operate In Venezuela
content: The Trump administration issued a general licence expanding the ability of oil companies to operate in Venezuela, marking a significant step to ease sanctions under the new US-backed leadership in Caracas.

title: Ex-Google Engineer Convicted Of Stealing AI Secrets For Chinese Companies
content: Former Google software engineer Linwei Ding was convicted by a federal jury in San Francisco on Thursday of stealing AI trade secrets from the US tech giant to benefit two Chinese companies he was secretly working for

title: Amid Iran Tensions, US Sends Destroyer Delbert D. Black To Middle East
content: The U.S. Navy has sent an additional warship to the Middle East, a U.S. official told Reuters on Thursday, amid a large military buildup in the region and soaring tensions.

title: Explained: Why Elon Musk Wants To Put AI Data Centers In Space
content: A proposed merger between Elon Musk's SpaceX and xAI, reported exclusively by Reuters on Thursday, could give fresh momentum to Musk's plan to launch satellite data centers into orbit.

title: 23 Fishermen Detained By Bangladesh Return Home
content: Bangladesh on Thursday repatriated 23 Indian fishermen while New Delhi released 128 Bangladeshi fishermen.

title: Trump Says 'Hopefully' Won't Need Iran Military Action
content: US President Donald Trump said Thursday he hoped to avoid military action against Iran, saying he planned to have further talks with Tehran on a possible nuclear deal.

title: UN Chief Sees "A Lot Of Positive Expectations" From India-EU Trade Deal
content: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said on Thursday that he sees "a lot of positive expectations" from the recent free trade agreement between India and the European Union, and it could contribute to global multi-polarity.

title: EU Designates Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps As Terrorist Group
content: European Union foreign ministers agreed to designate Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) as a terrorist organisation, placing the powerful military force in the same category as Islamic State and al Qaeda.

title: Trump Threatens Canada With 50% Tariff On Aircraft Sold In US, Expanding Trade War
content: President Donald Trump on Thursday threatened Canada with a 50% tariff on any aircraft sold in the US, the latest salvo in his trade war with America's northern neighbor as his feud with Prime Minister Mark Carney expands.

title: Trump To Impose Tariffs On Countries That Sell Oil To Cuba
content: US President Donald Trump on Thursday threatened new tariffs on countries supplying oil to Cuba, escalating a pressure campaign against the Communist-run island.

title: Flight From Bangladesh Lands In Pak's Karachi For First Time In 14 Years
content: A flight from Bangladesh capital Dhaka landed at the Jinnah International Airport in Pakistan's Karachi on Thursday, restoring non-stop air connectivity between the two countries after 14 years.

title: 22 Students Hospitalised After Consuming Mid-Day Meal In Telangana: Cops
content: Around 22 students were hospitalised after consuming mid-day meals at a primary school in Sangareddy district in Telangana, officials said.

title: AI Startup Perplexity Signs $750 Million AI Cloud Deal With Microsoft: Report
content: AI startup Perplexity has signed a $750 million agreement with Microsoft to use its Azure cloud service, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.

title: US Defence Secretary Hegseth Tells Trump Pentagon Is Prepared On Iran
content: US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said on Thursday the US military will be prepared to carry out whatever President Donald Trump decides on Iran to ensure Tehran does not pursue nuclear weapons capability.

title: "Respect Canadian Sovereignty": Carney Warns US On Alberta Separatist Push
content: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said Thursday he expects the United States to "respect Canadian sovereignty," responding to reports that State Department officials met with separatists from the oil-rich province of Alberta.

title: "Need Clarity": New Zealand Rejects Trump Invitation To Join Board Of Peace
content: New Zealand decided against accepting US President Donald Trump's invitation to join his Board of Peace, New Zealand's Prime Minister Christopher Luxon said in a statement on Friday.

title: Iran Warns Of "Decisive Response" To Any US Attack
content: Iran will deliver an immediate response in case of an attack by the United States, the army spokesman said Thursday, warning that US military bases in the region or an aircraft carrier could be targets.

title: UN Urges 'Restraint' From Law Enforcement After US Protester Deaths
content: UN chief Antonio Guterres called Thursday for "restraint" from authorities towards protesters in the United States after immigration agents killed two US citizens this month demonstrating against deportation raids in Minneapolis.

title: Bangladesh, Pakistan Resume Direct Flights After 14 Years
content: Direct flights between Bangladesh and Pakistan resumed on Thursday after more than a decade, as ties warm between the two nations that have long had an uneasy relationship.

title: Economic Survey 2026 Highlights: GDP Growth Estimated At 7.4% This Fiscal
content: Parliament Budget Session 2026 Highlights: Nirmala Sitharaman presented economic survey of India in Lok Sabha today.

title: Championship Series rosters revealed for PLL, WLL
content: the rosters for the 2026 Championship Series have also been revealed . players from the California Redwoods, Carolina Chaos, Denver Outlaws and New York Atlas will compete in the sixes format . all games will be available on the ESPN App and in the streaming hubs .

title: Draft guide: Rankings, tips, strategy, stats and m...
content: the 2026 ESPN fantasy baseball draft guide has everything you need to crush your drafts . from rankings and mock drafts to sleepers, breakouts and who you should -- or shouldn't -- draft . the draft guide will be updated frequently, so keep checking in for more insight, analysis, and projections.

title: Updated NBA Power Rankings: This might be the week...
content: a week from the 2026 trade deadline, the market remains relatively quiet up to this point . there have been major developments across both conferences as we narrow the second half of the regular season . the Cleveland Cavaliers are climbing the conference standings, riding a four-game winning streak .

title: Talking points: Mourinho's master class, biggest d...
content: a frantic Wednesday night wrapped the league phase of the UEFA Champions League . the goalkeeper scored a stoppage-time goal to seal the portuguese side's place in the knockout phase . arsenal completed a clean sweep, winning all eight of their league phase games, while Chelsea won 3-2 in Napoli .

title: Blakeney goes from an NBA player to alleged game fixer
content: federal law enforcement unsealed criminal charges alleging Blakeney was one of the ringleaders in a u.s. college basketball gambling and game-fixing scandal involving 26 defendants . the indictment alleges Blakeney convinced NCAA players that his other co-conspirators would pay $10,000 to $32,000 in exchange for poor performances, sitting out of or removing themselves from games, and providing information about players' health .

title: The Premier League stars who could still move this...
content: there is just under a week to go in the transfer window, so the clock is ticking for premier league clubs and players to make their moves . there are a number of players out there who still need to move before the window shuts on febr. 2 . if they've been ostracized from their club, asked for a move, got tangled up in difficult contractual circumstances, or simply need minutes ahead of the 2026 world cup, here are the major names in the premier league .

title: Our experts' favorite Super Bowl prop plays
content: there are seemingly endless ways to bet super Bowl LX . from the typical on-field stats to the off-field entertainment, there is also value to be found in the matchup between the Seattle Seahawks and the new England Patriots .

title: Final 2026 rankings: Who can play early? Who has N...
content: will Griffin, 230 pounds, has the arm strength to drive the ball to all levels and functional mobility similar to Fernando Mendoza . he has logged enough high-level reps to help with the transition in Gainesville .

title: Key stats and info to know before the 2026 Royal R...
content: royal Rumble, the third-longest-running annual WWE premium live event, returns on Saturday ( 2 p.m. ET, ESPN Unlimited . the event will feature a men's and women's Royal Rumble match, with the winners earning an opportunity to challenge for a world championship at WrestleMania 42 in April .

title: NCP seniors want Ajit's wife Sunetra as deputy CM; calls in Baramati for either son to fight bypoll
